Text: PhXAnarchy: Rebel Without A Clue.  You should /read/ some of the books I'm posting, many written by /real/ anarchists, not just pop up from time to time to make clueless comments about things you don't understand.
Dude (PhXAnarchy), real anarchists believe in individual liberties and property rights above anything.  They just don't believe there should be a government to regulate anything or to tax... ever.
